name: Supportive Housing
description: Conard House provides supportive housing to homeless and low-income San Franciscans at their nine residential hotels in the Tenderloin and South of Market. Additionally, the following on-site services are provided: - Counseling - Community involvement - Essential services, including health education and self-management training - Visit Conard House Supportive Housing Program Application and Referral Information: Online URL

howToGetIt: For more information, call 415-864-7833 or email admin@conard.org.
